column1: Little Goat Diner////Went for dinner on a Thursday night and the place was packed
column2: but we only had a twenty minute wait before being seated and the service was quick after that and the food was tasty. Everything on the menu is a la carte
column3: so be prepared to pay extra for any sides with your main dish. Desserts are mini pies baked next door
column4: but they were all out of all but one by the time we ordered so put in a request early!
